mapper.select: SELECT NVL(AD_IDX , '' ) AS AD_IDX /*관리자IDX*/ , NVL(ADMIN_ID , '' ) AS ADMIN_ID /*관리자ID*/ , NVL(ADMIN_PASSWORD , '' ) AS ADMIN_PASSWORD /*비밀번호*/ , NVL(ADMIN_NAME , '' ) AS ADMIN_NAME /*이름*/ , NVL(USER_CONTACT1 , '' ) AS USER_CONTACT1 /*연락처1*/ , NVL(USER_CONTACT2 , '' ) AS USER_CONTACT2 /*연락처2*/ , NVL(USER_ROLE , '' ) AS USER_ROLE /*멤버역할(ROLE)*/ , NVL(RT_IDX , '' ) AS RT_IDX /*회원사idx*/ , NVL(REG_DT , '' ) AS REG_DT /*등록일시*/ , NVL(REG_ID , '' ) AS REG_ID /*등록자*/ , NVL(MOD_DT , '' ) AS MOD_DT /*수정일시*/ , NVL(MOD_ID , '' ) AS MOD_ID /*수정자*/ , NVL(DEL_YN , '' ) AS DEL_YN /*삭제여부*/ FROM DC_ADMIN_INFO
